attributes.action: Investigate the  I.C.O. office in Wilmslow
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Could you raise a petition for the Freedom of Information Act, to which I have corresponded , about the situation into this F.O.I. Act.  With kind thanks.  Ron Nuttall

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
